abstract: Meet Valeria S., the German-Russian model featured in our upcoming women's issue.
snippet: Meet Valeria S., the German-Russian model featured in our upcoming women's issue.
lead_paragraph: Meet the young German-Russian model from Tula City, Russia, Valeria S. With a wide-eyed, freckly face like Angela Lindvall, it's no wonder a talent scout followed the 5-foot-10-inch beauty on her way home from school one day. But Valeria, whose favorite labels are Chanel, YSL, Givenchy and Céline, is not one to let a little attention shift her focus. In this story, which was shot on the streets of Manhattan's West Village, the shy but easygoing 21-year-old found herself with yet another fan, an older passer-by who hammed it up in front of the camera with her for a while. "I think he was trying to outpose me!" says the former ballerina of the unusual situation. With an impressive résumé that, in addition to T, already lists spreads in British Elle, Wonderland and V Magazine - all hitting stands this month - we're pretty sure Valeria stole the stage.
